title: SCAR: Semantic Cardiac Adversarial Representation via Spatiotemporal Manifold Optimization in ECG
summary: Deep learning models for Electrocardiogram (ECG) analysis have achieved expert-level performance but remain vulnerable to adversarial attacks.
